controls.caption: When not initialized
controls.name: whenNonInitialized
controls.description: This value is returned when the input array is not existing (not initialized)

controls.caption: When initialized
controls.name: whenInitialized
controls.description: This value is returned when the input array is existing (contains some data)

controls.caption: Require non-empty
controls.name: nonEmptyRequired
controls.description:
If set, an empty array (with zero length) is considered not existing: this function will return "When not initialized" if array length = 0.
If cleared, the length of the input array is not checked: this function only checks if the input is initialized.
